abstract: The F.D.I.C. chairman warns against “excessive government borrowing.”
snippet: The F.D.I.C. chairman warns against “excessive government borrowing.”
lead_paragraph: You can add one more item to the list of problems keeping Sheila C. Bair up at night. The nation’s capitol, she fears, will be ground zero of the next financial crisis.

headline.main: Next Financial Crisis May Start in Washington, Says Bair
